net.cloud.server.nio

Class NettyServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.cloud.server.nio.NettyServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ShutdownService

    public class NettyServer
extends Object
implements ShutdownService
    Initializes the server, built on the Netty framework. The class's task is to get the server up and running, ready to accept and deal with client connections.
    Creates its ShutdownHook at the end of start()

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int PORT
      The port the server will become bound to
      private NettyShutdownHook shutdownHook
      The ShutdownHook that'll take care of this server

    • Method Detail

      • start

        public void start()
           throws InterruptedException
        Start the Netty server. This is the part of the server that accepts and handles incoming connections. So after this, the whole thing will be ready for network I/O
        Throws:
        InterruptedException - If a channel operation was interrupted

      • getShutdownHook

        public ShutdownHook getShutdownHook()
                             throws NullPointerException
        Description copied from interface: ShutdownService
        Get the ShutdownHook associated with this service. There is no guarantee the hook has been created. There is also no absolute guarantee as to the behavior when that is the case. However, a NullPointerException would be great to throw. ('cause the hook is null, but let's avoid null checks)
        Specified by:
        getShutdownHook in interface ShutdownService
        Returns:
        The ShutdownHook responsible for this service
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - If the hook is not available
